This package is intended to help you compute powers. To use it load:

```{r}
library(powers)
```

You can take the square of any vector.

```{r}
square(2)
```

Or the cube.

```{r}
cube(2)
```

Or an exponent of you choice!

```{r}
pow(2,3)
```
